roleset.name: access, gain entry
roleset.note: ACCESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'access' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from access.01-v predicate notes)
ACCESS-N NOTES: Roleset for access based on verb entry access.01, OntoNotes access-n grouping senses 1, 2, 3, 5, 6,& 7; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from access.01-n)

example.name: do they really need to explain this?
example.text: Disk drives, which allow a computer to access its memory, generated 38% more revenue in the most recent period compared with the fiscal first quarter a year earlier.

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: U.S. access to the Japanese semiconductor market

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: The court has denied the mother access to her children after the incident.

example.name: Arg ) only
example.text: The restaurant just added wheelchair access.

example.name: Arg 1 as modifier
example.text: Data access in registers in main memory is much faster than access on the disk drive.

example.name: Accessing rage, all arguments
example.text: The therapist asked the patient about his recent accesses of rage at work.

roleset.name: able to be reached, attained
roleset.note: ACCESSIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to 'access.01'. (from accessible.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The left upper lobe lesion is indeterminate , but not be accessible for biopsy , though it could be resected , if necessary .
example.arg: though it could be resected, if necessary
